# AlphaOfTech

> Daily tech intelligence + weekly open-source tools. AI-powered insights from global dev communities and cutting-edge research.

## About

AlphaOfTech is an automated intelligence platform that analyzes 800+ tech stories, 7,000+ developer discussions, and 150+ research papers daily. It delivers actionable briefings for developers and founders.

## What We Publish

- **Daily Briefings**: Market signals, keyword trends, developer pain points, new products, and research highlights
- **Weekly Tools**: Open-source tools built from real developer pain points (via AutoSolve)
- **Product Reviews**: Analysis of InALign (AI agent governance), codex-router (multi-model routing), and more

## Key Topics

- AI/ML trends and tools
- Developer experience and productivity
- Open-source software
- Startup ecosystem
- Security and governance
- Cloud infrastructure

## Projects

- [InALign](https://github.com/Intellirim/inalign) - AI Agent Governance Platform (MCP server for tamper-proof audit trails)
- [codex-router](https://github.com/Intellirim/codex-router) - Intelligent routing for multi-model AI coding agents
- [gha-debug](https://github.com/Intellirim/gha-debug) - GitHub Actions debugging tool
